comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Possibly Lawrence, Edward M. — of Lubec, Washington County, Maine. Delegate to Republican National Convention from Maine, 1912; Progressive candidate for U.S. Representative from Maine 3rd District, 1913. from politicalgraveyard.com/bio/lawrence.html The special election at which he was the Progressive candidate was on September 8. 1913 Circumstantial evidence for the identification is that www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4195197382/ (also in this week's batch of Bain photos) is of another candidate in the same election.
